directions: Combine the red wine, Worcestershire sauce, mustard, lemon juice, tomato paste, balsamic vinegar, orange liqueur, brown sugar, salt, pepper, cumin, garlic, ginger, horseradish, oregano, basil, chives, dill, and green onions in a large bowl and whisk to combine. Make sure marinade completely covers the meat; marinade in refrigerator 16 to 24 hours.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon brandy-based orange liqueur (such as Grand Marnier®)
title: Basil Brad's Marinade of Love
